nodes.text: The Bilbringi shipyards were a shipyard located at Bilbringi. The Separatist Providence-class Dreadnought Lucid Voice was dismantled sometime after the Clone Wars between the Separatists and the Galactic Republic at the shipyards. Four years after the ship was dismantled, its array tower was stolen and used to build a warship by dissidents.

The Bilbringi shipyards were first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the 2014 novel Tarkin, written by James Luceno and published by Del Rey. The shipyards were first mentioned in the Star Wars Legends continuity in The Last Command, a 1993 novel written by Timothy Zahn and published by Bantam Spectra.
